title: User Specific Views in Adaptive Cards
shortDescription: This sample app shows how to create user-specific adaptive card views for Teams, enabling personalized content and auto-updating across various chat contexts.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to create user-specific views in Adaptive Cards within Microsoft Teams, using features like Action.Execute and auto-refresh for dynamic updates. The app enables personalized content, allowing seamless interaction across personal, group, and team contexts.
